ref.div: Lindegarth, M., J. Carstensen, S. Drakare, R.K. Johnson, A. Nyström Sandman, A. Söderpalm, and S.A. Wikström, eds. 2016. Ecological assessment of Swedish Water Bodies; development, harmonisation and integration of biological indicators. Final report of the research programme WATERS. Deliverable 1.1-4, WATERS report no. 2016:10. Havsmiljöinstitutet, Sweden.
